metadata.name: Raison D'etre
metadata.description:
One of approximately 50 paintings and sketches created for Utherworlds, a graphic novel published by Ballistic Publishing in 2009. The award winning Utherworlds IP included an original story, a soundtrack, 2 written languages, an interactive website and maps of the various locations.  

Hand painted using Photoshop and the ole Wacom tablet.
